stripped_text: Subroutine The next time the Runner encounters a piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each of its subroutines (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of that encounter.
text: [subroutine] The next time the Runner encounters a piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each of its subroutines (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of that encounter.
title: TL;DR
